project_descr:
Output 1: Improved policy coherence for Technical Vocational Education and Training (TVET) policy.
Output 2: coordinated planning and strengthen monitoring and evaluation of TVET provision.

outputs.output_descr: The planned outcomes on completion are (a) 2012 Technical Vocational Education and Training (TVET) policy implemented; and (b) TVET provision is monitored and evaluated.
